news.content:
AMA

Ask us your questions & we will answer them on Tuesday, 10th November! Full call details here: https://t.me/threefoldnews/56
news.excerpt: Ask Me Anything session with ThreeFold

previous.title: ThreeFold at Barcelona Blockchain Week
previous.excerpt: On 6th October at 1pm CEST our very own rocket scientist Weynand Kuijpers will be representing ThreeFold.
